properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naa priyamaina Yesu prabhu velaadi stotramulu Nee vichchina rakshanakai deva stotramu stotramulu Neevu chesina upakaraamukai devaa Stotramu stotramulu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aapada dinamulalo naa prabhuni talachitini Deva nee dayathodane naadhaa aashrayam ponditini{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oka kshana samayamulo nashinchu naa jeevitam Naa hrudayam marchitivi devaa krupathone jevinchutakai{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokapu papamulo ne paapiga jeevinchitini Shudda hrudaya michchavu devaa ninnu ne darshinchutakai{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ee dinamu ne paaduta nee valane Yesuprabhu Ellappudu ne paadedan devaa naayandu vasiyinchumu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mandira samruddini nee Prajala sahavaasamunu Nee sannidhi aanandamunu devaa krupatone nosagitivi{/lang-eng}
